titleStmt.title: Comfort to the afflicted. Deliuered in a sermon preached at Pauls-Crosse the xxi. day of May, M. DC. XXVI. Being the last Sunday in Easter terme. By Antony Fawkener, Mast. of Arts, of Iesus Colledge in Oxford
titleStmt.author: Fawkner, Antony, b. 1601 or 2.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by H. Lownes] for Robert Milbourne,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached at Pauls-Crosse.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
